from daglib_vault import prolog
server_ip_addr = _get_ip_addr("m1")
sg_id = prolog(filename="instances.config").\
    get_containing_any(["publicipaddress", "securitygroups", "groupid", "instanceid"]).\
    get_between_patterns(start=server_ip_addr, end="InstanceId", incl_end=False).\
    get_between_patterns(start="SecurityGroups", end="GroupId", incl_start=False).\
    remove_quotes().\
    get_col(col=2).\
    first()
    
allowed_ports = prolog(filename="security_groups.config").\
    get_between_patterns(start=sg_id, end="SECURITYGROUPS", incl_end=False).\
    get_containing_all(["IPPERMISSIONS", "tcp"]).\
    get_col(col=2).\
    lines

_problem = True    
if port in allowed_ports:
    _problem = False
